> [{quoted}](name=Tormentula,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ox3EY7Pn,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-27T00:10:26.259+0000)
>
>http://pre15.deviantart.net/31fc/th/pre/i/2014/245/2/e/_lol__lux______by_beanbean1988-d7xo20q.jpg
May I ask what you did so the link to the picture showed in m&g doesnt show? Im having trouble to pick make a picture for title and not showing the link etc. in the actual post...

I made the image url a text link.

pretend { = [ 
Put the image URL inbetween parenthesis

It would look like this: but with [] not {}

{}(the image URL)

You can actually just quote the main post to see what I mean.
Ah, thats the trick! Thank you very much!
Lol
Garen is a beyblade not a filthy fidget spinner. You insult me.
clickbait bitch.
